about_the_game:
In this online, asymmetric, mess-with-your-friends party game, one player controls a Burglar trapped in a house by a Kitsune and forced to do random tasks while 2-8 other players play as invisible Ghosts with the ability to possess household objects and use them to ambush the Burglar, take control of the body, and attempt to accomplish their own tasks. The first one to finish their tasks and escape the house with the body wins the round!

Form lobbies and play online with your friends or join public lobbies.

Play as the Burglar:

-Explore the house to find the objects on your list and make it to an exit while avoiding ambushes

-Pay attention to subtle visible and audible clues to tell if a ghost possessed a nearby object

-Use the dodge mechanic to quickly roll out of the way of an ambush

-Use the night vision mechanic to walk around in the dark or turn the lights on and let your eyes adjust

Play as the Ghosts:

-Customize the look of your ghost with several Colors, Eyes, and Flair to choose from

-Possess objects and time your ambush to hit the Burglar and take control of the body

-Use decoys while possessing objects to taunt and goad the Burglar

-Watch the tasks that the Burglar completes and undo them later after taking control

-Turn lights on near the Burglar to cause a flashbang effect and discharge his night vision

-Turn lights off near the Burglar to plunge him into darkness until his night vision charges

-Utilize the Ghost's glow to easily see in the dark

-Scout out the house to learn the location of the shuffled rooms before becoming the Burglar
detailed_description:
Full Game vs Daily Demo Edition

In the Full Game, there's no restriction on daily play time or custom match settings. You can still play with demo players though, we found a way to allow lobbies to accept players from both versions of the game.

short_description: Trapped in a house cursed by a Kitsune and forced to play his game, you must compete with other souls to take control a burglar's body and gain your freedom. Play as a stray soul trying to ambush the burglar by possessing household objects or as the burglar trying to finish tasks and find an exit!
